title: AE/Pr插件：镜头模糊虚焦插件 Fast Camera Lens Blur v4.1.0 Win版
author: 大众脸
content: 插件可制作逼真的摄像机镜头模糊效果，渲染速度更快！多种参数可控制。此外，它还可以渲染通常通过组合几层模糊来表示的辉光。
supported_versions: After Effects CC 2018, CC 2017, CC 2015.3, CC 2015, CC 2014, CC, CC 2019; Premiere CC 2018, CC 2017, CC 2015.3, CC 2015, CC 2014, CC, CC 2019

add: Add rendering precision (Auto / 32 bit float / 32 bit int / 64 bit double).
fix: Fixed the problem that the picture was broken at 32 bit composition.
improvement: So far, when the radius is small, the problem that the gain did not work much has been corrected.
Legacy precision considering compatibility with the past was added.

other.mac_download_note: AE/Pr插件：镜头模糊虚焦插件 Fast Camera Lens Blur v4.1.0 Win版
